reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater incredibly soft and appreciate its excellent quality, describing it as a perfect standard crewneck. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some reporting it runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SUPER SOFT & COMFORTABLE
items.body: The sweater is much nicer than expected. I normally need extra small sizing, but took a chance that a small would be okay. It is more than okay. It fits perfectly and is every bit as soft as cashmere! The price is very moderate for such quality. I really like the many color choices and will buy at least 2 more once I wash and wear this one just to be sure. Before wearing I have washed the one I have on gentle cycle with Woolite for Darks. Even though it advises air drying, I had great results by placing it in the dryer on medium for 20 minutes, then shaping it smoothly on a towel to finish drying with very good results. Read more
items.author: BeeJay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My most prized sweater!
items.body: Sweater is perfect....in quality, color, softness, light-weight warmth; fits my 100 lb frame to a T! Many compliments come my way when I wear it! My favorite sweater! I love it. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: gini posell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color and a nice quality sweater
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater! The color (burgundy) is rich and attractive. The material is soft and good quality. I have not washed it yet, but it seems like it will hold up well (without going in the dryer). I ordered a M and the fit is just right, not too tight, not too baggy (34DD for reference). Great fall sweater! Read more
items.author: Marie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Fall Sweater
items.body: Sweater is soft and comfortable. I ordered a medium which was true to size. If you wanted a more fitted style just order a size smaller. I can wear both sizes depending on the look you need. The sweater does pill under the arms but can be easily addressed by using a cashmere comb. Overall good value for the price can point. FYI 5’3” 135lbs. Read more
items.author: Toronto Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it so much, I bought 2 colors
items.body: What a great sweater. Looks classy on. God fit, not oversized and soft. I love it. Read more
items.author: JZ723

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, versatile and fun!
items.body: The fabric of the sweater is not too heavy yet not see through...and is soft on the skin. The size for me was true as a medium. The style is versatile and durable, with the ability to be worn by itself, or over a collared shirt, or dressed up with a decorative scarf; and can be worn with jeans, slacks or a skirt. The fact the price point is not outrageous is an absolute bonus! Read more
items.author: Amazon shopper

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Slight deviation in color from photo, but great sweater
items.body: These sweaters are comfortable and really versatile, but the Grey that came was a slightly lighter dove gray, not deep charcoal as pictured. I'm keeping it for layering, however. They will pill, but a sweater comb can typically help. I use a lingerie bag to wash and dry on a rack. They dry fairly fast, thankfully, as I wear the various colors I own pretty often. I regret buying a medium in response to reviews that indicated they ran small. To me, it's a little boxy and not as fitted as I prefer. Read more
items.author: Nashville POI

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing sweater!
items.body: This sweater is a perfect fit! It is the perfect length and color. It is also soft and comfortable. (Female, 5’5”, 165 lbs, size small) Read more
items.author: Amber

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B-grey, B-light Pink, A-burgundy, B-black, B-blue Bonnet, A-beige, A-blue Bonnet, B-khaki, A-mustard Yellow, B-off White, A-navy, A-pink, A-white, A-vivid Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
